mapper.select:
SELECT B.*, TO_CHAR(CDATETIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CDATE, NVL(CCNT, 0) AS COMMENTCNT FROM TBL_BOARD B LEFT JOIN ( SELECT BOARDNO, COUNT(*) AS CCNT FROM TBL_COMMENT GROUP BY BOARDNO ) T ON T.BOARDNO = B.BOARDNO WHERE 1=1
AND KIND = #{kind}
ORDER BY B.BOARDNO ASC
ORDER BY TITLE ASC
ORDER BY CNT DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_BOARD VALUES(B_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{contents}, #{userId}, 0, 0, 1 , SYSDATE, SYSDATE)
